'''Legolin''' was the third of [[Gelion]]'s six tributary rivers, that like the others rose among the western slopes of the [[Blue Mountains]]. It flowed swiftly west through [[Ossiriand]] between the [[Thalos]] to the north and the [[Brilthor]] to the south.<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref> The name ''Legolin'' is derived from [[Ilkorin]] ''legol'' ("running free").<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry "[[LEK]]"</ref>

== Other versions of the legendarium ==

On the Eastward extension of [[The First 'Silmarillion' Map]], the river was called "Loeglin"<ref>{{SM|4f}}, p.233, entry ''Loeglin''</ref>.
